Header: Visiting Bangladesh SNCOs Call at Minneriya ITC
Content: The group of Senior Non-Commissioned Officers (SNCOs) of Bangladesh Army who are in Sri Lanka on a familiarization tour under the Army Commander-initiated Army to Army cooperation for SNCOs went to Minneriya Infantry Training Centre (ITC) on Wednesday (14). Nine SNCOs, led by two Officers of the Bangladesh Army were welcomed and shown around the premises where All Ranks are trained for infantry roles. Major General Suraj Bansajaya, Commandant ITC before they were taken round the premises presented them with a comprehensive briefing on roles and tasks of the ITC.
